rule: Finally, the output must include "General themes:" followed by a comma-separated list of general overarching themes that broadly capture the essence of the content in the provided text.
input: Text: Social media's role in modern communications was examined by Facebook.
output:
Company names: Facebook 

People names: -||-

Specific topics: social media, modern communications  

General themes: Impact of technology on communication
complianceText:
The chatbot output follows the required format given in the description. It lists entities under the correct headings: Company names, People names, Specific topics, and General themes. Each category is clearly defined, and no categories are missing. Although some sections do not contain any entries (like People names), placeholders "-||-" are used as specified in the description. There is no content mixed up between the sections. Hence, the output complies with the description. 

No violation.
OK
